name: Comic Life Document
summary: A COMICLIFE file is a document created by Comic Life, an application used to create comic books, scripts, picture albums, and other visual documents. It stores one or more pages with custom layouts, which include text and images. COMICLIFE files replaced .CL2DOC files as the default format for saving documents in Comic Life with the release of version 3.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: COMICLIFE file open in plasq Comic Life 3
images.alt: COMICLIFE file open in plasq Comic Life 3
